CreateLifecyclePolicy.name: CreateLifecyclePolicy
CreateLifecyclePolicy.description:
Create a data lifecycle policy to manage the scheduled creation and retention of Amazon
                                                EBS snapshots. You may have up to 100 policies.

DeleteLifecyclePolicy.name: DeleteLifecyclePolicy
DeleteLifecyclePolicy.description:
Delete an existing data lifecycle policy. In addition, this action halts the creation
                                                and deletion of snapshots that the policy specified. Existing snapshots are not affected.

GetLifecyclePolicies.name: GetLifecyclePolicies
GetLifecyclePolicies.description: Returns a list of summary descriptions of data lifecycle policies.

GetLifecyclePolicy.name: GetLifecyclePolicy
GetLifecyclePolicy.description: Returns a complete description of a single data lifecycle policy.

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list the tags associated with a resource.

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to add or update tags of a resource.

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove associated with a resource.

UpdateLifecyclePolicy.name: UpdateLifecyclePolicy
UpdateLifecyclePolicy.description: Updates an existing data lifecycle policy.
